I somehow figured that, Your advice is definetly true when it comes to youtube though.[/bq]

oh man, youtube comments can give you 10 different life threatening diseases.

see comments in whatever mainstream hip hop video: racism.
comments in videos showing strange traditions from certain tribes : racism
comments on popular mainstream music : special snowflake wrong jenearshun syndrome.
comments on anything political: conspiracy theories "obama was osama" type.
comments on anything religious: my religion > your shitty religion go kill yourself.
